flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: OpenSprinkler is an open-source programmable sprinkler timer. It works with standard 24VAC sprinkler valves, and features a web-based scheduling interface, expandable number of water zones, on-board LCD display, and a beautiful clear-cover case.
guide.title: OpenSprinkler: An Open-Source Web-Enabled Sprinkler Timer
